workflows.creator: f21f100c-9e62-42e2-a744-061c18de134c
workflows.title: Sync SF Quote To NS Quote

boolean-condition-1.title: Create NS Quote?
boolean-condition-1.description: Creates the NS Quote only if it was not already created, based on the NetSuite ID.

boolean-condition-3.title: Create O2C ticket?
boolean-condition-3.description: Creates the O2C ticket only if it was not already created for the SF quote.

boolean-condition-6.title: Load data?
boolean-condition-6.description: Loads data for creating the O2C ticket only if the quote was not created in the current process.

boolean-condition-9.title: New Business/Upsell?
boolean-condition-9.description: If is new business or upsell we need to create the accounts in netsuite if doesn't exist yet.

branch-1.title: Quote Status?
branch-1.description: Flow is triggered when the status changes, here only checking the quote status to know what will be next steps

call-workflow-10.title: Get subscription plan
call-workflow-10.description: Get the subscription plan from the quote lines

call-workflow-11.title: Create NS Customer for Partner
call-workflow-11.description: Call subflow that will create a NS Customer for the partner if doesn't exist

call-workflow-12.title: Get NS metadata
call-workflow-12.description: Retrieves the NS metadata for the subsequent NS call.

call-workflow-2.title: Sync Quote Primary Contact
call-workflow-2.description: Syncs SF contact on the primary quote to NS contact, creating it if needed.

message.value: This opportunity is marked for manual O2C processing, please manually raise the Quote and Invoice Request O2C tickets for this opportunity

O2C quote request generated. O2C ticket link: <ticket link>
We don't  generate the jira ticket for sandbox. This message is only a example of what is added to the description field in production.
O2C quote request generated. O2C ticket link: {$.steps.text-helpers-1.result}

call-workflow-8.title: Cancel out for signature agree
call-workflow-8.description: Call workflow that cancels out for signature agreements related to the informed quote that were not signed by any party.

call-workflow-9.title: Create NS Customer for Account
call-workflow-9.description: Call subflow that will create a NS Customer for the account if doesn't exist

jira-cloud-1.title: Search Sales Rep ID in JIRA

jira-cloud-2.title: Update Submitter
jira-cloud-2.description: We can't set the submitter on creation, but we can update it afterwards

loop-1.title: Loop Quotes
loop-1.description: Loop other quotes to cancel out for signature agreements

netsuite-1.title: Get other quotes linked to sub
netsuite-1.description: Get other quotes linked to subscription to cancel the Out for signature agreements sent for other quotes

q.value: SELECT id FROM transaction WHERE custbody_related_subscription = {$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.NetSuite_ID__c} and id != {$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].NetSuite_ID__c}

netsuite-3.title: Get quote type
netsuite-3.description: Retrieves the quote type for the existing NS quote.

netsuite-8.title: Update Quote memo
netsuite-8.description: Used soap api because the quote in rest api is beta  and is not active

salesforce-3.title: Update Quote status
salesforce-3.description: Updates the status to "Generated" as the NS quote is already generated.

script-1.title: Select customer IDs
script-1.description: Selects the customer out of the end-user, the reseller, and the distributor.

storage-3.title: Set Quote data
storage-3.description: Sets Quote data in storage for the current scenario (NS quote creation).

storage-4.title: Set Quote data
storage-4.description: Sets Quote data in storage for the current scenario (NS quote already created).

storage-5.title: Get Quote data
storage-5.description: Retrieves the Quote data from the storage.

message.value: Event is from another org ('{$.steps.trigger.organization_id}' instead of '{$.steps.salesforce-6.records[0].Id}'). Please fix the sandbox outbound messages list.
Netsuite id not set for the opportunity owner({$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Name}).
Quote expiration date is not in future. Expiration date: {$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c}, Quote Id: {$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].Id}

dependencies.name: Create NS Customer from SF Account
Convert a SF Quote to a NS Quote
Subflow Sync SF Account to NS
Create NS Contact from SF Contact
